markdownRemark.html: Desert Springs is an award-winning family leisure resort with a golf course that is based on an American course with a Mexican feel. The fairways are quite narrow with lush green grass, overlooked by the Mexican style villas. There are quite a few cactus's planted off the fairways, the greens have some degree of difficulty due to the slopes and there are quite few water hazards with a long carry to get over. There is a small shop and nice relaxing facilities, the bar has an outside seating area overlooking a lake with fish in.With easy access from the International Airports or Almería and Alicante, Desert Springs has constructed Europe´s first ever Arizona style desert golf course.

frontmatter.address: Crta. Las Cunas-Palomares s/n 04610 Cuevas del Almanzora, Almería, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 68.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 68.00 euros
